title: Zots Helps Out
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 147 words, Level F (Grade 1), Lexile 350L, Fiction Series
description: Abby and Zots have a problem: Zots wants to play, and Abby has chores to do. Zots offers to help, but will he only make things worse? In Zots Helps Out, readers will be surprised by the ending to this funny story. The book uses detailed, colorful illustrations; high-frequency words; and repetitive sentence patterns to support readers. It can also be used to teach students how to identify the problem and solution in a story as well as how to identify and use quotation marks.
meta: Problem and Solution : Identify problem and solution
Short Vowel Sounds : Discriminate short vowel /e/ sound
Quotation Marks : Recognize and use quotation marks

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
